name: Trench Coat Ballers
description:
"We're too short! We'll never play pro ball!"

"I have an idea... and a trench coat!"

With one guy on the other's shoulders, they can finally live their dream of playing professional basketball. Control two players simultaneously while trying to score baskets. Just don't fall while holding the ball, or you'll get a foul!

Its more fun with two people, one for the top and one for the bottom. However, you can play single player as well.
